MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the SY23 postcode area of Aberystwyth, affecting properties in Llangwyryfon and surrounding area. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:30PM due to repairs required to a faulty piece of equipment. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 11:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:47PM on 23rd February 2021.
